title: Lalpa i malsawmna ropui
lyrics:
Lalpa i malsawmna ropui,
Tunah kan dawng leh ta;
Kan kut tlawm hi mal i sawm a,
Tempul mawi i run rem nan.

Lalpa Jeho, i hming ropuina tur,
I thlarauvin min rawn luahpui ang che aw;
I in thianghlim ngei lo ni se,
Lo cheng rawh - i tan kan hlan.

Aw, i tana thawkrimtuten,
Lawmman hlu an chang ang;
Tun atangin chatuan thlengin,
An lawmna a sang zual ang.

Lalpa, he in ropuiah hian,
Thupha kan rawn chawiin;
I ngaihdam aw rimawi tak chuan,
Min chhang la i runah hian.

Thlarau chau tan chawlhna in nuam,
Van ruai ropui an kilna;
Riltam, tuihalte lut ula,
Chatuan lawmna in hmu ang.
